casebody.data:
Frank Anthony SCOLA, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
JP MORGAN CHASE BANK, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, and JP Morgan Chase & Co., Defendants-Appellees,
and
Kathleen Scola, Estate of John Barrow Brown, and City of Wayne, Defendants. SC: 158903
COA: 338966 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 8, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellant to extend the time for filing his supplemental brief is GRANTED. The supplemental brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 30, 2019.
